WorkPlace.Name: HOLISTIC BODY CARE ApS
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription:
Beauty Avenue always loves to welcome like-minded & talented people to our tribe. We all share our passion for creating a world of holistic, certified-organic and non-toxic beauty. We love our job and we simply aim to be the best salon & spa in Denmark. We have won several awards on several occasions. We feel very proud about these achievements, as we perceive them as a great acknowledgement to our hard-work, dedication and willingness to make a difference.
Love. 
Stella & Beauty Avenue's Team

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Award-winning salon & spa in Copenhagen is looking for 2 holistic cosmeticians / beauticians / beauty therapists
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Join our great team of happy, dedicated and diverse beauty and wellness nerds at our beautiful salon & spa in Copenhagen, Denmark.

At Beauty Avenue we are passionate about our industry. Our career is our hobby and we thrive on becoming the best.

We also take pride on the quality of service that our guests get at our salon & spa. That is why we would like to work with people who are service-minded at heart.

You are naturally happy, positive and full of energy. You are also focused and service-minded. You love structures, procedures and systems. Yet you embrace change with open arms.

You must at least speak English; Danish is definitely a great plus, as the majority of our guests feel more comfortable communicating in their native language.

You are educated as beauty therapist, beautician or cosmetician, and have work experience in a similar position. We do occasionally welcome exceptionally fresh and promising talented people. Skills can be taught; character and work ethics cannot.

It would be a great advantage if you had previously performed Sugaring hair-removal and threading treatments.

Only full-time positions available (37 hours per week).


How to apply?

Send us an email to talent@beautyavenue.dk with the SUBJECT 'Beauty Therapist' with the following documents in PDF format: your CV, your answered questionnaire (it can be downloaded from beautyavenue.dk/jobs) and your recommendation letters.

Contact our Talent Recruiting Team by email, if you have any questions or would like to hear more about the position: talent@beautyavenue.dk.

Important

Due to the amount of applications we receive, we will only be able to consider the candidates that have sent all the required documents.
